name: Aklavya
description:
Please wait a while for the game to load. Report all bugs to vivek@aklavya.org. Thanks.

This demonstration could not have been possible without the help of my father, Pradip Da and Tony from Pixel Crushers.Visit Aklavya to know more about exactly what we are trying to achieve.Also please answer a few questions regarding our game in order to make it better by participating in this survey.

This is just a technology demonstrator and development work is ongoing. To encourage us to conitnue our efforts a donation will be extremely helpful.
